name: Shalini
wishText: Hope you having lot of fun there and stay wow. Whatever happens I'll always there for you never doubt that 🤞
textInChatBox: Many more happy returns of the day shalini ❤
text2: Itha tha na panalam nu nenacha
text4: Enaku ethachum different aah panalam nu thonuchu
text5Content: Because Madam tha periya aalu aachey 🏃‍♂️
outroText: Okay, ipa vanthu ithu epdi iruku nu sollu.
replayText: Illana itha click pannu marubadium varum 😂.
